Bruno Borges was described by his family
as intelligent the philosophy student
loved reading so much so that according
to relatives he was capable of burning
through 15 books a month but he also
loved writing on March 27th 2017 Bruno
had gone missing from his family home in
Brazil but not before covering his
bedroom entirely with characters and
symbols every inch of it from floor to
ceiling had been marked upon inspection
it was discovered that Bruno left behind
14 manuscripts all of which were encoded
and much like the walls hand-done
accompanying the manuscripts and writing
on the walls were diagrams images and
most fixated on by the media a painting
of Bruno and an alien both were in

Giordano Bruno upon the news of Bruno's

involved with some kind of secret

others however were not so convinced
Bruno meanwhile remained missing and the

which will be covered in this video but

unfortunately not much is known about

Bruno's siblings know that during the

Bruno had locked himself in his room and

it's important that I point out that

he also happened to be one of Bruno's

to be

Bruno's mother opted to not allow him
the funds which he was later able to

in June of 2017 while Bruno was still

Bruno's cousin the one who agreed to

in the contract it was at this point
before Bruno even showed back up again
that police concluded that Bruno had not

the entire thing assumed and pretty much
